abstract: Hans Adu Sarpei (born 28 June 1976 in Tema) is a Ghanaian-German ex-footballer who played as a full back. His last club was Bundesliga side Schalke 04.He also was a long time regular for the Ghana national football team. Sarpei most recently played for his country at the 2010 FIFA World Cup in South Africa.
